message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand that $20000 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $18000 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $15000 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to your budget, Bob! I can do $16500 for the product. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $14500 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to your budget, Bob! I can do $16000 for the product. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $14000 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can do $15800 for the product. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal!
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $13500 for the product. This is my final offer.
